Her unwavering dedication and positive attitude have consistently earned her the admiration and pride of the entire DCC staff. Brittany has been in the dialysis field for years, and she started her career caring for patients in the In-Center dialysis setting. She then moved on to home therapy dialysis treatments. Brittany has worked in home therapy for 4 years and has extensive knowledge and experience. She had firsthand experience with her Dad being on dialysis.
